nodes.text: Base 354-23X was a secret New Republic impound facility located on the moon of Avedot. By the time of the war between the First Order and the Resistance, the impound was decommissioned. While on a mission to acquire weapons for the Resistance, Poe Dameron learned from a contact on the Wayward Comet that the impound still contained a cache of weapons confiscated from pirates, and he and Finn planned to visit the impound and take the weapons.
